spec.description: ClusterImageSetSpec defines the desired state of ClusterImageSet

releaseImage.description:
ReleaseImage is the image that contains the payload to use when installing
a cluster.

status.description: ClusterImageSetStatus defines the observed state of ClusterImageSet

exampleYAML:
apiVersion: hive.openshift.io/v1
kind: ClusterImageSet
metadata:
  name: example-clusterimageset
spec:
  releaseImage: "example-releaseImage"
